waitlist.text: Thank you for joining the waitlist for Dogsup Vet AI! Hang tight! To ensure a great experience, we’ll be sending invites gradually over time. We’ll let you know when we are ready for you.

subsymptomlist.scratchingOrPawingAtTheEar: Scratching or pawing at the ear

welcomepage.subtitle: A vet at your dog’s disposal at any time, anywhere.
welcomepage.rollingsymptomstitle: We are here to help your dog with:

whathashappendpage.title: What has happened?
whathashappendpage.content: Click on the image that reflects the problem you want help with today.

content.first: If your matter is an emergency, please get in touch with a physical vet for a visit or call your local pet ambulance.
content.second: If you are not sure who to call, please contact your dog’s insurance company for advice.

howitworkspage.title: How it works
howitworkspage.content1: Dogsup Vet AI can provide you and your dog with an initial opinion on how to treat a health problem.
howitworkspage.content2: Make sure you take your time when answering the questions. After answering the questions, you will get an answer from the AI within 5 seconds. The more informative answers you can give, the more accurate assessment from the AI.
howitworkspage.content3: The more informative answers you can give, the more accurate assessment from the AI.
howitworkspage.wheredoestheaigetinfo: Where does the AI get its information from?

ifemergency.title: IF EMERGENCY:
ifemergency.content: Contact a physical vet for a visit or call your local animal ambulance.

dogagepage.content: Drag our friend Nelson to the correct age of your dog or write it in the field and click ‘Next’.

dogbreedpage.content: Use the dropdown or search for your dog’s breed below. Click on ‘Next’ when you are done.

errors.selectbreed: Please select a breed before proceeding.

symptomspage.content: Use the dropdown or search for your dog’s breed below. Click on ‘Next’ when you are done.

content.inthenextsteps: In the next step, we will ask you to elaborate on each problem.

title.second: Let’s add some more detail to...

betweensymptomandsubsymptompage.content: We are almost at the end! We simply need some more details about the symptoms to give you accurate results and actions to take.

detailinfopage.title: Detail info
detailinfopage.content: Any information regarding your dog’s current condition may be helpful in making an assessment and provide you with the best possible guidance.

summarypage.title: Summary
summarypage.content: This is a summary of all information you have provided. Read it through, double-check that it’s correct and edit the information if needed.

nextsteps.title: Next steps
content: Thank you for using Dogsup Vet AI!

The assessment will be saved on your profile. To make the process faster next time you use Dogsup Vet AI, we save all historical information about your dog, this can be changed at any time from your profile.
The assessment will also be sent to your email.

whatIsYourDogsName.enterTheNameOfYourDog: Enter the name of your dog...
